専門家3行コメント.@ja: 減少傾向が続いていた新規陽性者数の7日間平均は、今回、増加に転じた。変異株の置き換わりや接触機会の増加などの影響が考えられる。感染機会を減らすため、基本的な感染防止対策を継続する必要がある。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The seven-day average of new cases, which had been on a decreasing trend, has started to rise this week. This is thought to be due to factors such as an Omicron subvariant, said to be more infectious, replacing the dominant subvariant and more opportunities for contact between people. To reduce the chance of becoming infected, there is the need to continue implementing basic infection prevention measures.

専門家3行コメント.@ja: 入院患者数は、今回、再び減少したが、自宅療養者等は増加している。現時点では、通常医療との両立が可能な状況になってきているものの、救急医療体制への影響が未だ残っている。
専門家3行コメント.@en: Although the number of hospitalized patients fell again this week, the number of patients recovering at home is increasing. At the current time, it is becoming possible to maintain a balance between COVID and non-COVID healthcare. However, emergency care continues to be affected.

display.@ja: 感染状況の推移に注意が必要である
display.@en: Infection trends need to be closely observed.

display.@ja: 通常の医療との両立が可能な状況である
display.@en: A balance between the provision of COVID and non-COVID health care is possible.
